sentence.Network_en: Mt .13:26 And when the blade sprouted and produced fruit , then the tares appeared also.
sentence.Network_cn: 太十三26到长苗吐穗的时候,稗子也显出来.

sentence.Network_en: But when the blade sprang up and brought forth fruit then appeared the tares also.
sentence.Network_cn: 到了麦子长大结穗的时候,稗子也出现了.

auth_sentence.content: Jesus called them "the tares among the wheat".
auth_sentence.res_content: Jesus called them "the tares among the wheat".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Jesus called them "the tares among the wheat".

auth_sentence.content: When the harvest is gleaned the evil tares will be separated from the good wheat.
auth_sentence.res_content: When the harvest is gleaned the evil tares will be separated from the good wheat.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When the harvest is gleaned the evil tares will be separated from the good wheat.

auth_sentence.content: Jesus called them "the tares among the wheat" and he rebuked them on sight.
auth_sentence.res_content: Jesus called them "the tares among the wheat" and he rebuked them on sight.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Jesus called them "the tares among the wheat" and he rebuked them on sight.
